remarks: Restrict the base of an upper real quantifier to an upper real set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
statement:
rexico $p |- ( ( A C_ RR /\ B e. RR ) -> ( E. j e. ( B [,) +oo ) A. k e. A ( j <_ k -> ph ) <-> E. j e. RR A. k e. A ( j <_ k -> ph ) ) ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d j ph $.
